if vids are rencoded the isnt gonna work you need to run this fix inside Biogame/movies folder as a bat file
@echo off
setlocal EnableDelayedExpansion
for %%i in (*.bik) do (
set /a sz=%%~zi*3
echo !sz!
fsutil file createnew "%%~dpni" !sz!
move "%%i" "%%i.bak"
copy /b "%%i.bak" +"%%~dpni" "%%i"
del /f /q "%%~dpni"
)
cls
echo.
echo.  Done !
echo.
echo   -Lyx
echo.
pause
